mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t. name, a. NAME sex, DATE_FORMAT(t.birthday, '%Y-%m-%d') birthday, t.photo, b. NAME category, t.pcode, t.reading, t.intro, t.descri FROM writer t LEFT JOIN ( SELECT CODE, NAME FROM portal.dict WHERE category_id = '01' ) a ON t.sex = a. CODE LEFT JOIN ( SELECT CODE, NAME FROM portal.dict WHERE category_id = '83' ) b ON t.category = b. CODE WHERE t.id=#{condition.id}
